    <div class="main--fullpage section">
      <div class="container">
        <div class="row">
          <div class="col-md-12">
          <--!Your Code Would Go Here-->
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

Note: You can use .main to push the footer all the way to the bottom of the page. This helps the page look full even when there is not enought content.
